title: Twisted tree line
body: Can you guys like actually just leave 3v3 open I like playing it and its really annoying that I cant when ever i crave it.

replies.body:
The OCE server does not have a large enough population to sustain 3v3 to be on all the time.

If you want 3v3 all the time you have two options.

1) Move to another country within either the EU or NA region and play on those servers

or

2) Invite enough people to play often enough that the server population is increased enough that all queues are open all the time.
